OOC:  Well do.

BIC:

Tucson looks out over the vistas, craning his neck to=
 see over the parameter.  He then lowers his head back down to Rodimus.

" =
 We have to put order back into the forest.  The only way we can do that, i=
s to locate the mech who is controlling the dinosaurs and subdue him.  I ha=
ve a feeling that part is up to us.  The old dragon would have wanted it th=
at way."

He turns to Leo Prime and Wing Caliber.

" Leo Prime, Wing Calibe=
r, I need you to head into the forest and be ready to direct forces on the =
ground.  Once we engage the enemy I know there's going to be trouble.  I ne=
ed you to create a chaos buffer so we can avoid pandemonium.  Take as many =
Maximals and Autobots with you as you see fit.  And most of all, please, be=
 careful my friends." 

He then looks back to Rodimus.

" I may be wrong as=
 to the meaning of my new form but I think somehow this has always been wit=
hin me and the old dragon could somehow sense it.  Plus my temper, I realiz=
e it can get rather out of hand at times.. I believe the term is hot headed=
ness and of course, dragons breathe fire, so... Anyway that's what I think =
as far as your question is concerned.  All right, we have work to do.  The =
sooner we set the forest straight, the sooner we find Cheetor."
    
He now=
 spreads his wings and offers his back to Rodimus.  

"We're meant to do th=
is together, and together we will."

Perpetually on the move and constantly=
 busy.
